content:
path /v3/offchain/xrp/asset
operationId XrpAssetOffchain
summary Create XRP based Asset
description 2 credits per API call
Create an XRPbased asset in a virtual account The asset must be created and configured on the XRPL blockchain before creating a trust line
This API call will create an internal virtual currency You can create virtual accounts with offchain support
requestBody
CreateXrpAsset
type object
properties
issuerAccount
description Blockchain address of the issuer of the assets
maxLength 34
minLength 33
type string
token
description Asset name
type string
pattern AF0940
maxLength 40
minLength 40
basePair
description Base pair for Asset Transaction value will be calculated according to this base pair eg 1 TOKEN123 is equal to 1 EUR if basePair is set to EUR
type string
required
basePair
issuerAccount
token
required True
responses
